questions.question: If you could have any superpower, which would it be?
options: Flying - I love the idea of exploring and being free!
Invisibility - It'd be cool to observe and discover without being seen.
Super strength - I want to tackle any challenge head-on!
Mind reading - Understanding others can really make a difference.

questions.question: Imagine you're a YouTube star. What's your channel about?
options: Travel and Adventure - Sharing my exciting journeys around the world.
Art and DIY Projects - Bringing my creative ideas to life.
Tech Reviews - Exploring the latest gadgets and innovations.
Social Issues - Discussing important topics and making a change.

questions.question: It's time to choose your sidekick! Who or what do you pick?
options: A loyal dog - Always ready for action and adventure.
A smart robot - Technology is cool and helpful.
A wise owl - Knowledge and wisdom are my allies.
A caring friend - Together, we can help and support others.

questions.question: You're in a band! What role do you play?
options: The fearless leader - Lead singer and frontperson!
The creative soul - Writing songs and setting the vibe.
The tech wizard - Handling all the sound and special effects.
The peacemaker - Making sure everyone gets along.

questions.question: What's your dream project to work on?
options: Organizing a big sports event or an outdoor festival.
Creating an art exhibition or a graphic novel.
Developing a new app or a cool video game.
Planning a community service project or a charity event.

questions.question: If you could time travel, where would you go?
options: The future - To see how advanced the world will become!
The past - To witness the great historical moments and arts!
Anywhere with technology milestones - I'm curious about tech evolution!
Key social movements - I want to experience the change as it happened.
